Text:
Finally, "GL something er other #1â" - Ive been waiting for this one. I cannot wait until next week when they release:

GL - That one guy (no the other one) #1

GL - Marriage of a Green Lantern to Marilyn Monroe #1

Almost forgot:

GL - The horny orange chick mounts the Corps #1

GL - The extra stitches in our uniforms mean we're COOL #1
This one is actually off to an interesting start - obvious where its going though. Strange that they started Rayner from scratch
Hey, GH, can you please post issue #2?  Can't seem to find this one anywhere.  Love the torrents.  And thanks!!
